name: .PTRZ File Extension
summary: Learn about .PTRZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: Because PTRZ files are encrypted, you cannot open them. Currently, there is no way to decrypt PTRZ files.

To recover your files, you should retrieve them from a recent backup or perform a System Restore. Note that performing a System Restore will cause you to lose any files created since your last restore point. You may want to back up uninfected files before performing a System Restore.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
